items.sentence: Tom and Mary are the only ones still in the room.
Tom and Mary have strong feelings for each other.
Tom and Mary intend to get married in the spring.
You may find your umbrella at the Lost and Found.
You should do what your lawyer advises you to do.
You worry too much about what other people think.
I guess I\'ll be living with you a year from now.
Tom\'s office is three miles from where he lives.
Tom\'s parents got divorced when he was thirteen.
Tom\'s question caught Mary completely off-guard.
